name: Techno Blast
summary: Deals damage, and its type depends on the drive Genesect is holding. It can be either Electric, Fire, Ice, or Water.
viability: Because of its great base power, Genesect can actually use this move now. Douse Drive is pretty good because it serves as coverage for Genesect's only weakness: Fire. Putting a Choice Scarf is usually better on Genesect, though, and to use this move effectively you need a drive.
